name: PunkIBCO
description: PunkIBCO. Contract for the Initial Bond Curve Offering. The IBCO is based is a pro rata devision of the contribution and the fixed distribution of $PNK tokens.

eventDecorators.name: Claimed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Received
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Transfers tokens pro rata to sendContribution mapping. If minimalRevenue is not met, the senderContribution will be returned Emits a {Claimed} event.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateFundraisingTime
functionDecorators.description: Updates {startTime} and {endTime} of IBCO if contract owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _duration
parameterDecorators.description: : number of seconds the IBCO should last.

parameterDecorators.name: _startTime
parameterDecorators.description: : unix time of the start of the IBCO.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws sent funds to contract owner when minimal revenue is met.
